original_text: We sat down next to each other, but David wouldn't look at me. He lowered his head what he was thinking. I had high hopes for him so I wanted to let him join the cross-country. I comforted him in a soothing voice: "you have work so hard for this event. I hope your work hard is rewarding, I will support you forever." My words like a warm stream rushed his being. David raised his eyes meet my eyes with his eyes sparkling with confident. David felt inspired. I was pleased beyond description that I can light his strong determination. David was thinking for a while, "I hope I can try it." He laughed, his eyes shining with excitement. I pulled him into my arms, "I believe you can do it." I watched as David moved up to the starting line with the other runners. But David still had butterflies in his stomach and his hands were sweaty. With starting competition. So nervous was him that he was slow.

revised_text:
We sat down next to each other, but David wouldn’t look at me. He lowered his head, lost in thought. I had high hopes for him, so I wanted to encourage him to join the cross-country team. I comforted him in a soothing voice: 'You’ve worked so hard for this event. I hope your efforts are rewarded, and I will support you forever.' My words flowed like a warm stream, touching his soul. David raised his eyes to meet mine, his gaze sparkling with confidence. He felt inspired. I was overjoyed to see that I had ignited his unyielding spirit. After a moment of silence, he said, 'I hope I can try it.' He laughed, his eyes shining with excitement. I pulled him into my arms and whispered, 'I believe you can do it.'

I watched as David moved up to the starting line with the other runners. Yet David’s heart pounded with nerves, his palms slick with sweat. As the competition began, so nervous was he that he started off slowly. But beneath the fear lay a quiet strength—a determination that would carry him forward, step by step.
